This is a personal academic website. I respect your privacy and do not collect personal data from visitors for commercial purposes.

## Data Collection

This website is static and hosted on **GitHub Pages**. I do not personally collect, store, or sell any data from visitors.

However, as a hosting provider, GitHub may collect typical server log information (such as your IP address and browser type) for security and reliability purposes. You can read GitHub's Global Privacy Statement [here](https://docs.github.com/en/site-policy/privacy-policies/github-privacy-statement).

## Cookies

This website does not use tracking cookies or third-party advertising cookies.
